news_header: President Xi Jinping to attend Brics summit in Kazan, Russia from October 22-24.
news_text: The Brics summit, featuring emerging economies including China, Russia, Brazil, Egypt, Ethiopia, India, Iran, South Africa, and the UAE, will take place in Kazan, Russia from October 22 to 24. The summit is significant as it is one of the few international platforms where Russia is involved amidst the ongoing war. It remains uncertain if Saudi Arabia will participate. The Brics alliance represents 40% of the world's population.
